data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Santander, Colombia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santander, Colombia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Santander, Colombia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 118 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Santander, Colombia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Santander, Colombia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 244,772 believers in the state of Santander the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Santander, Colombia.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Santander, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Santander, Colombia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Santander
